result.eng: We spent a year and a half doing that work.

result.eng: I spent a year doing that work.

result.orig: Chaith mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sin
result.html: Chaith mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sinI spent a year doing that work.

result.eng: She spent her whole life doing that work.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.html: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ponchtml: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.html: Tá mé go donaI am doing poorly [not well].
result.ponchtml: Tá mé go donaI am doing poorly [not well].

result.ga: Céard eile a bhíonn ar bun agat
result.orig: Céard eile a bhíonn ar bun agat
result.html: Céard eile a bhíonn ar bun agatWhat else are you doing?
result.ponchtml: Céard eile a ḃíonn ar bun agatWhat else are you doing?

result.ga: Tá ag éirí go han-mhaith liom

result.html: Tá ag éirí go han-mhaith liomI'm doing really well.
result.ponchtml: Tá ag éirí go han-ṁaiṫ liomI'm doing really well.

result.html: Níl ag éirí go rómhaith liomI'm not doing too good.

result.eng: He is doing a course in An Cheathrú Rua at present.

result.eng: Tomás and I are doing research degrees and as a result we do not have fixed hours.

result.eng: Listen, what are you doing tonight?

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
